author: Unknown
text:
ICMA recently published a report titled "Local Government Use of Social Media to Prepare for Emergencies" found here: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301647/Local_Government_Use_of_Social_Media_to_Prepare__for_Emergencies
The report provides case studies in how social media was used in very different emergencies to enhance emergency management plans.  
In addition, this link: http://gcn.com/articles/2010/09/06/social-media-emergency-management.aspx
provides 5 ways that social media is changing emergency management.  
We want to continue this conversation and add to our report.  
How is your community using social media to enhance your emergency management plans?
title: Social Media and Emergencies
